author: Staff Reporter
text:
Unidentified persons broke open the locked house of the former AIADMK district secretary Siva Selvarajan at Manavilai near Vellichandai on Tuesday night and decamped with eight sovereigns of gold ornaments and Rs.12,000.

The burglary came to light when Mr. Siva Selvarajan returned home from Chennai along with his family.

Based on a complaint lodged by him, Vellichandai police have registered a case.
title: House burgled
